archimate:Device.name: ID Card Printer (ICP)
archimate:Device.documentation:
Intended Use:
For issuing employee ID cards. Includes support for dual-sided printing and barcode encoding for integration with hospital security and IT systems.
1. Print Capabilities
• Print Technology: o Direct-to-card (DTC) o retransfer printing for edge-to-edge coverage • Print Mode: o Full-color (YMCKO) and monochrome o Dual-sided (automatic duplexing) • Print Resolution: o 300 dpi (dots per inch) standard o : Up to 600 dpi for fine details (text or microprinting) • Print Speed: o Full-color, dual-sided: 120–150 cards/hour o Monochrome: up to 700 cards/hour • Card Capacity: o Input hopper: Minimum 100 cards o Output hopper: Minimum 100 cards o Manual single-card feed slot (for one-off printing)
2. Card Compatibility
• Card Types Supported: o PVC, composite PVC/PET, rewritable cards o Thickness: 20–40 mil (0.5–1.0 mm) • Card Size: o CR80 standard size (85.6 mm × 53.98 mm) • Encoding Options: o 1D/2D barcode printing (Code 39, Code 128, QR, DataMatrix, etc.) o Magnetic stripe encoder, contact/contactless smart card encoder (MIFARE, RFID)
3. Connectivity
• Standard Interfaces: o USB 2.0 or USB 3.0 o Ethernet (RJ-45, 10/100Mbps) for networked printing o Wi-Fi module for wireless deployment • Driver Support: o Windows 10/11, Windows Server, macOS o TWAIN and SDK support for integration with HR, access control, or visitor management systems
4. User Interface
• Display: o LCD control panel with status indicators and error messages o Color touchscreen interface for standalone operation • Control Software Compatibility: o Supports major ID design applications (e.g., Evolis Badge Studio, Zebra CardStudio, Entrust InstantID, Seagull BarTender) o Database import (CSV, Excel, ODBC) for bulk badge printing
5. Security Features
• Access Control: o Password-protected settings, administrator lockout mode • Card Security: o UV printing, holographic overlays, and lamination module o Supports tamper-resistant ID formats
6. Physical & Power Requirements
• Dimensions: o Approx. 13–18 in (W) x 9–12 in (D) x 9–12 in (H) • Weight: o 10–20 lbs depending on model and features • Power Supply: o 100–240V AC auto-switching, 50/60 Hz o Energy-saving mode (sleep/idle under 10W)
7. Durability & Maintenance
• Printhead Life: o Minimum 300,000 cards, replaceable • Cleaning Kit: o Printer includes automated cleaning cycle, with supplied cleaning cards and pens • Duty Cycle: o Designed for daily use in moderate- to high-volume environments
8. Recommended Accessories
• Spare ribbon cartridges (YMCKO, monochrome) • Blank CR80 PVC cards (pre-encoded) • ID card holders/lanyards • External hopper extension for bulk printing • Secure badge laminator
